Package mks.myworkspace.crm.repository

Class AppRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • mks.myworkspace.crm.repository.AppRepository
  • @Repository
public class AppRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    This repository class is used for handling data operations such as insert, udpate, delete and hide releted to various entities in the application.

    This class uses JdbcTemplate and SimpleJdbcInsert for executing SQL operations directly on the database.

    It also interacts with multiple repositories such as: CustomerRepository, OrderStatusRepository, GoodsCategoryRepository, and OrderCategoryRepository. Logging is supported via Lombok's @Slf4j.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Le Ngoc Thach, Nguyen Hoang Phuong Ngan, CRM Team

      • insertCustomerCare

        public void insertCustomerCare​(java.util.List<mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare> customerCares,
                               int reminderDays)
        Inserts a list of customer care records into the crm_customer_care table if they do not already exist. Sets the reminder date as customer creation date plus the given days.
        Parameters:
        customerCares - List of CustomerCare objects representing customer care data.
        reminderDays - Days for setting the reminder date in customer_care.

      • updatePriorityCustomerCare

        public void updatePriorityCustomerCare​(mks.myworkspace.crm.entity.CustomerCare customerCare)
        Updates the priority of a specific customer care record.
        Parameters:
        customerCare - the CustomerCare object containing the ID and new priority value This method updates the "priority" field of a customer care record in the "crm_customer_care" table based on the provided customerCare.getId() and sets the new value from customerCare.getPriority().

      • updateCustomerCareStatus

        public int updateCustomerCareStatus​(int reminderDaysForNew_Case1,
                                    int reminderDaysForPotential_Case1)
        Updates the care status of all customer care records based on the latest customer interactions.

        The method performs a bulk update on the "crm_customer_care" table using business rules that depend on the customer's current status ("Mới" or "Tiềm năng") and the time difference between their reminder date and the last interaction date.

        Status is updated to one of the following:

        • "Đã chăm sóc, Chăm sóc đúng hạn"
        • "Đã chăm sóc, Chăm sóc trễ hạn"
        • "Chưa chăm sóc"
        • "Chưa chăm sóc, Chăm sóc trễ hạn"
        Parameters:
        reminderDaysForNew_Case1 - number of allowed reminder days for customers with status "Mới"
        reminderDaysForPotential_Case1 - number of allowed reminder days for customers with status "Tiềm năng"
        Returns:
        number of rows affected by the update
